# (PART) Subprotocols {-} 

```{r, results="asis"}
if (nrow(dependencies) > 0) {
  mdfiles <- paste0(dependencies$protocol_code,
                    "-", 
                    dependencies$version_number, 
                    ".md")
  child_docs <- file.path(dependencies$version_number,
                          mdfiles)
  
  child_docs <- child_docs[dependencies$appendix]
  
  if (length(child_docs) > 0) {
    res <- map(child_docs, knit_child, quiet = TRUE)
    cat(unlist(res), sep = "\n")
  }
}
```
